short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple in browser notes application to keep track of what you need to do!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Paper? who needs paper when all your notes can be accessed at your finger tips with NotesPlusPlus!

- Three new themes added.
- Notes are stored within browser cache.
- version 0.1.0 out now

https://bowyer.co
